Welcome to AmazMod! Please follow this presentation to learn how to install the service app on watch and grant app access to Notifications on phone. Access to Notifications AmazMod needs access to notifications so they can be sent to your watch, please tap the button below to grant access to notifications, then come back to the presentation. Please grant access to notifications before proceeding. Install Service App on Watch Please download amazmod_service APK from AmazMod website and install it to your watch. To install, you can use adb (all platforms), APKInstaller or Amazfit Tool if your computer runs Windows. Restart Devices Then please restart both watch and phone. All Done! Now you can go to AmazMod settings and choose the apps you want to get notfications from and add your customized replies.\n\nEnjoy using AmazMod! \u2661 Time since last charge Waiting for data Disabel when DND is ON Notifications will not be sent to watch when Do Not Disturbed is detected Disable remove notifications Do not remove notifications from watch when removed from phone Enable messenger voice calls Messenger voice calls will send notifications to wacth Enable local notifications Local notifications without actions will be sent to watch Enable notifications when screen is locked Send notifications if screen is on but phone is locked Enable notifications ungroup Notifications from the same sender will be separated Filters Connected Disconnected Connecting… LOCALOK
